patthana24.2:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… purejāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana24.2:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana24.2:2.1_2: aññamaññe cattāri …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana24.2:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:4.1_0: Nanahetuṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:6.1_0: Nanahetuṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.2:8.1_0: Nahetuṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ,
